feed.title: Immich Kiosk Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.21.0
entry.content:
Offline mode

Kiosk now supports Offline Mode, allowing assets to be downloaded for viewing without an active connection to Immich.

Why it's useful:

Offline Mode is ideal for setups where maintaining a live connection to Immich might be costly or inefficient. For example, if your Immich storage is hosted on a NAS with disks that spin down to save power, using Offline Mode prevents Kiosk from constantly triggering disk spin-ups.

Key Highlights:

  • Offline viewing: View photos without needing a live connection to Immich.
  • Configurable settings: Set limits on asset count, disk usage, and expiration.
  • Persistent caching: Use Docker volume mounts to retain offline assets between container restarts.
  • Offline Mode must be explicitly enabled in config.yaml.

Setup Notes:

  • Use the use_offline_mode=true URL parameter to trigger offline behavior on devices.
  • Only a limited set of URL parameters are supported in Offline Mode (e.g., show_progress, frameless, clock_source).

Limitations:

  • Some features like Album Ordering, Experimental Video, and Like/Hide buttons are unavailable in Offline Mode.

Example Config:

yaml offline_mode: enabled: true number_of_assets: 500 max_size: 50mb expiration_hours: 24

Read the offline mode docs

Fully Kiosk Browser support

If you use the Fully Kiosk Browser to display Kiosk on a Android device and you have the pro version. You can set the new sleep_dim_screen to true to dim the screen when in sleep mode.

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/697e8f54-1d04-43d7-a4ce-dc54e1b1e4a1

Read the sleep mode docs

Update to splitview layout

When using layout=splitview, Kiosk will now automatically switch to layout=splitview-landscape if the device or browser is in portrait orientation.

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/2d7f957f-eb4e-404c-a540-3c011557a20c

Demo

Kiosk now has a online demo

require_all_people

The "Require all people" feature allows you to filter images to only show those where all specified people are present together in the same photo.

Read the require all people docs

Asset owner

Added show_owner which displays the asset owner. Thanks to @koostamas for adding this.

Show Image QR

Added show_image_qr which displays the QR code that links to the asset in Immich next to the metadata.

Added the /image/reload endpoint

The /image/reload endpoint wraps the /image endpoint (which serves a raw image) in a light html page that auto reloads itself using refresh setting.

Why?

~Someone on Reddit asked me to so they could use Kiosk on thier Kindle~

Useful if you have an old device that Kiosk can not support.

iframe

Immich Kiosk now supports iframe integration, allowing you to embed custom content directly into your Kiosk display.

Why it's useful:

This feature is perfect for users who want to enhance their Kiosk with additional contentâ€”such as local weather dashboards, calendars, or custom informational pages. For example, you can embed a local HTML file showing your smart home stats or a remote webpage with real-time updates.

Read the iframe docs

mute/unmute button

When experimental_album_video is set to true, a mute/unmute button will appear in the menu.

Kiosk will remember your preference using local storage and try to apply it after a refresh.

However, due to browser restrictions, unmuting video requires user interaction. If your saved preference is to have video unmuted, Kiosk will wait for you to interact with the screen before applying that setting.

Thanks to @ngirardin for helping implimenting this feature.

update to http_timeout

Kiosk's frontend will now utilise the http_timeout configuration. If a Kiosk API endpoint timesouts 3 times in a row Kiosk will reload the browser.

What's Changed

ðŸš€ New Features

  • Feature/AgeSwitchToYearsAfter by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/374
  • Feature/frontend timeout reload by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/375
  • Feature/require_all_people by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/376
  • Feature/demo by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/382
  • Feature/Option to show asset owner by @koostamas in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/385
  • Feature/auto-reload add /image/reload endpoint by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/395
  • Feature/offline mode by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/386
  • Feature/show_image_qr by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/400
  • Feature/fullykiosk by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/396
  • Feature/iframe by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/405
  • Feature/image-orientation-class by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/407
  • Feature/mute button by @ngirardin in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/380

âš¡ Fixes

  • Fix/video image by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/387
  • Fix/moreinfo-splitview-landscape by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/403

ðŸ““ Documentation

  • Rename pre_fetch config option to prefetch for consistency by @ngirardin in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/378

ðŸ”¨ Maintenance

  • deps by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/394

New Contributors

  • @ngirardin made their first contribution in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/378
  • @koostamas made their first contribution in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/385

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.20.2...v0.21.0

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.21.1
entry.content:
ImmichFrame App support

  • sleep_dim_screen now works when running in the ImmichFrame app
  • Setting the authsecret in settings will be passed along to Kiosk as password.

About Page

Added an about page at http://{URL}/about

Offline icon

This is the new "Can not reach the Kiosk server" icon.

What's Changed

ðŸš€ New Features

  • Feature/ImmichFrame dim screen by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/419
  • Feature/ImmichFrame auth support by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/417
  • Feature/about-page by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/421

âš¡ Fixes

  • [Fix] Parse asset date time with location by @koostamas in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/412

ðŸ”¨ Maintenance

  • Chore/api dto update by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/416
  • Chore/deps by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/422

Other changes

  • Fix/offline icon by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/415

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.21.0...v0.21.1

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.21.2
entry.content:
Latest release version

Added latest release version on the /about page (it's also a clickable link). This data is cache for 5 mins to avoid angering GitHub.

Remove trialing slash

URLs with quires after a trailing slash will no longer fail

Example: - before http://{URL}/about/?password=foo would fail

What's Changed

ðŸš€ New Features

  • Feature/about latest version by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/426
  • Feature/caching for about page by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/428

âš¡ Fixes

  • Remove trialing slash by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/425

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.21.1...v0.21.2

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.21.3
entry.content:
/image/reload

Improved the /image/reload endpoint and added some metatags. The endpont also now supports image_fit

/image/reload docs

Auth headers

Added support for X-Api-Key and Authorization: Bearer when using password.

Auth headers docs

What's Changed

ðŸš€ New Features

  • Feature/image reload metatags by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/430
  • Feature/add headers as auth option by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/435

âš¡ Fixes

  • fix/sleep while dimmed by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/431

ðŸ”¨ Maintenance

  • node and templ bump by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/432

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.21.2...v0.21.3

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.21.4
entry.content:
Error retry

If an error occurs and the refresh length is greater than 5, the Kiosk frontend will automatically skip to the next asset after 5 seconds.

Device ID

Kiosk will now use the device IP, browser user-agent and url to generate a unique device ID. This means if the frontend refreshes (due to network issues or other reasons), the same cache will be used.

Behind Proxy

New behind_proxy configuration option. This tells Kiosk that it is behind a proxy and to look for X-Forwarded-For headers when generating the device ID.

Webhook click event

Added user.interaction.click webhook event.

Album owned keyword

Added owned keyword.

Possible keywords: - all - owned - shared - shared - favorites - favourites

What's Changed

ðŸš€ New Features

  • feature/retry on error by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/436
  • feature/unauth screen design by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/438
  • feature/consistent device ID by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/437
  • feature/user click webhook by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/440

âš¡ Fixes

  • fix/font by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/439
  • fix/owned albums by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/442
  • fix/hide button permission by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/443

ðŸ”¨ Maintenance

  • move away from go-mod-outdated by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/445

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.21.3...v0.21.4
